data.name: Sky Squadron Demo
data.description:
Have you got what it takes to keep the skies safe from ruthless villains? Your island paradise is being invaded, and hot-shot Keith Koala needs to jump into the gunner’s seat and fight off some of the most menacing meanies that the Aussie Islands have ever seen!  Grab the controls to blow them out of the sky before they plunder everything your home has to offer.

In Sky Squadron VR you take control of a plucky Koala and his friends while they defend their home from evil invaders. Grab the gun controls by both hands to aim and shoot in this classic arcade rail-shooter that sees the player destroy fighters, dismantle giant bosses and repair their plane on the fly. Invite a friend to join you in online co-op, or compete for the highest score on the global leaderboards.

Features
- An Australian take on the classic “Star Fox” universe with a WW2 twist
- Online co-op to easily play with friends
- Branching missions with different objectives
- Fully destructible bosses
- Compete on the globa

changelog.change_log:
Updated loading screen that won’t burn your eyeballs out

Updated voice lines

Plugging in headphones will no longer cause a crash!

Multiplayer Update

Time to team up with a mate and work together to take down those drongos!
      
Create a squad and go cause some damage.

Need a squadmate? Join our Discord and find one today!

Someone has turned our sunny aussie xmas into a winter wonderland! We can't play backyard cricket in the snow - go find out what's going on!

What's new:
- Time limited xmas mission now available!
- Multiplayer and Leaderboards are back

Update 0.28 - Hand Tracking Update

We’ve got some exciting news for our Oculus Quest players - full hand tracking support! 

What’s new:
- Full hand tracking support for the Oculus Quest
- New hands models! Wriggle those koala fingers!
- New environmental impact effects when hitting different surfaces
- Added grip animations when firing
- Added new hand tracking tutorial
- Added new mission map screen

G’day mates! We’ve got a huge new update for you with a bunch of new features and improvements we’ve made in response to your amazing feedback. In this latest update we’ve got a brand Boss mission for you to take on, along with a new heat system you’ll need to manage when taking it down.

Note: We’ve had some technical issues with our multiplayer lobby provider, so temporarily taken it offline while we find something to replace it with. Co-op will be back soon!

What’s new:
-A brand new Big Boss mission! Jump in and take it down.
-Heat system you’ll need to manage when taking on the bad guys.
-New ‘smoke’ hazard - wave it away to clear your view.
-New HUD layout to better show damage and weapon heat
-Mission generation improvements which allow for more dynamic levels
-Various other bug fixes and improvements

- Check out the new 'Tucker Truckers' time-limited playtest event!
- Added support for more social platforms (Oculus)
- Better title music looping!
